name: CAKeyframeAnimation
desc: An object that provides keyframe animation capabilities for a layer object.

items.name: var values: [Any]?
items.desc: An array of objects that specify the keyframe values to use for the animation.

items.name: var path: CGPath?
items.desc: The path for a point-based property to follow.

items.name: var keyTimes: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: An optional array of NSNumber objects that define the time at which to apply a given keyframe segment.

items.name: var timingFunctions: [CAMediaTimingFunction]?
items.desc: An optional array of CAMediaTimingFunction objects that define the pacing for each keyframe segment.

items.name: var calculationMode: CAAnimationCalculationMode
items.desc: Specifies how intermediate keyframe values are calculated by the receiver.

items.name: var rotationMode: CAAnimationRotationMode?
items.desc: Determines whether objects animating along the path rotate to match the path tangent.

items.name: var tensionValues: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: An array of NSNumber objects that define the tightness of the curve.

items.name: var continuityValues: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: An array of NSNumber objects that define the sharpness of the timing curveâ€™s corners.

items.name: var biasValues: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: An array of NSNumber objects that define the position of the curve relative to a control point.
